trans-unit.source: Defines an interface that proffers a free-threaded host object that allows for background threads to call directly (avoids marshalling to the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个 proffers 允许直接调用的后台线程的自由线程主机对象的接口 （可避免封送处理到 UI 线程。

trans-unit.source: This code is called only on the UI thread and kicks off the actual build with VB.
trans-unit.target: 此代码仅在 UI 线程上调用，并启动时，具有 VB.的实际生成

trans-unit.source: [out] the build-succeeded event.
trans-unit.target: [out] 的生成成功事件中。

trans-unit.source: [out] the build-failed event.
trans-unit.target: [out] 的生成失败事件中。

trans-unit.source: Returns 0 if the method was successful.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，则返回 0。

trans-unit.source: Performs functions at the end of compilation.
trans-unit.target: 执行函数在编译的末尾。

trans-unit.source: A flag indicating whether the build succeeded.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否生成成功的标志。

trans-unit.source: Value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for success.
trans-unit.target: 值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>成功。

trans-unit.source: Returns 0 if the method was successful.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法成功，则返回 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets a free-threaded host object that allows for background threads to call directly.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个允许直接调用的后台线程的自由线程主机对象。

trans-unit.source: Avoids marshaling to the UI thread.
trans-unit.target: 可避免封送到 UI 线程。

trans-unit.source: Returns the free-threaded host object.
trans-unit.target: 返回的自由线程主机对象。

trans-unit.source: Sets the `/highentropyva` value as specified.
trans-unit.target: 集`/highentropyva`作为指定值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to set the `/ highentropyva` to indicate support of high entropy Address Space Layout Randomization (ASLR); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>若要设置`/ highentropyva`来表明支持高熵地址空间布局随机化 (ASLR); 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the method was successful.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果此方法成功。

trans-unit.source: Sets the `/platform` value to <xref uid="langword_csharp_AnyCPU32BitPreferred" name="AnyCPU32BitPreferred" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 集`/platform`值赋给<xref uid="langword_csharp_AnyCPU32BitPreferred" name="AnyCPU32BitPreferred" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ManagedCompiler.Prefer32Bit%2A> property is set on the project, SetPlatformWith32BitPreference changes the `/platform` value `AnyCPU` or the default platform value (`null` or "") to `AnyCPU32BitPreferred`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ManagedCompiler.Prefer32Bit%2A>在项目上设置属性，SetPlatformWith32BitPreference 更改`/platform`值`AnyCPU`或默认平台值 (`null`或"") 到`AnyCPU32BitPreferred`。</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.ManagedCompiler.Prefer32Bit%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [/platform (Visual Basic)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).The `AnyCPU``/platform` switch setting (`/platform:AnyCPU`) runs your application as a 64-bit process whenever possible, falling back to 32-bit for 32-bit-only systems.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[/platform (Visual Basic 中)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。`AnyCPU``/platform`切换设置 (`/platform:AnyCPU`) 运行你的应用程序作为 64 位进程，只要有可能，回退到 32 位仅 32 位系统。

trans-unit.source: However, running applications as 32-bit is often preferred to running them as 64-bit because 64-bit applications may consume more memory.
trans-unit.target: 但是，作为 32 位运行应用程序通常是首选作为 64 位运行它们，因为 64 位应用程序可能会占用更多内存的。

trans-unit.source: The `AnyCPU32BitPreferred` setting is similar to `AnyCPU` except that its default action is to run applications in 32-bit mode on systems that support either 32-bit or 64-bit mode.
trans-unit.target: `AnyCPU32BitPreferred`设置是类似于`AnyCPU`只不过其默认操作是在 32 位模式下运行应用程序，支持 32 位或 64 位模式的系统上。

trans-unit.source: This setting accommodates future processors that may not have a fallback 32-bit mode.
trans-unit.target: 此设置能够适应将来可能没有回退的 32 位模式下的处理器。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> to set the `/platform` value to <xref uid="langword_csharp_AnyCPU32BitPreferred" name="AnyCPU32BitPreferred" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>若要设置`/platform`值赋给<xref uid="langword_csharp_AnyCPU32BitPreferred" name="AnyCPU32BitPreferred" href=""> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_False" name="False" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref> if the method was successful.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_True" name="True" href=""></xref>如果此方法成功。

trans-unit.source: Sets the subsystem version as specified.
trans-unit.target: 设置为指定的子系统版本。

trans-unit.source: The subsystem version.
trans-unit.target: 子系统版本中。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the method is successful.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果方法成功。
